description: Konstruct was an experimental electronic music collective based in London in the 90s with members Nikolaos Paravatos (Gr) Leonidas Danezos (Gr), Sharon Katanka (IS), Bua Watanawiki (Ta) and Will Hackerby (UK). Participating to the squat culture and producing in the studio The Stables, the collective was active in the London underground scene and released 3 EPs on Kontruct Records (Outwards 2001, Groovedriller, Parallel Cat 2004). In 2004 Kontruct performed in Athens @ Gagarin, Loop and Bios. Primitive and psychedelic electronic sound. In the last 10 years, Kontruct members moved around and brought several projects to life. On Thursday 19th of February, Nikolaos Paravatos (Vivian Coma) and Leonidas Danezos (Alcalica) together with Julie Loi (Alcalica) are improvising with live analogue electronics and traditional instruments bridging the way from London squat scene of the 90s to the Aegean of today. Free entrance.
name: Konstruct (live) @ SOME BIZZARE
